entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Lunenburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lunenburg 09:00 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: 2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: -0.8°C
Wind: NW 28 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
